name: David James
occupation: I AM A DRILLING ENGINEER, I WORK FOR GOVERNMENTS AS A PROFESSIONAL, I LOVE WHAT I DO FOR LIVING BECAUSE I AM A PROFESSIONAL IN MY JOB.
description:
I am open minded and liberal on race, lifestyle and
life choices. I think it is important to laugh every
day. I am serious about my work.I’m friendly,kind and
caring,sensitive,loyal ,understanding,humorous ,fun to be with,down to
earth,accepting,truthful and helpful,with honest blue eyes.confiding, forgiving,cheerful and bright,generous, charming and above all God fearing
I need an opened minded woman thats got a heart of gold. someone thats gonna love me for me and nothing else,someone simple, honest,supportive and loyal someone i can trust, count on, who’s gonna be always
there for me..I know physical characteristics border on shallowness but i am attracted to what my brain is wired for so that’s that.
She has to like kissing and yes even talking, and she must be God fearing
